SearchEquipmentGroupList.MainSQL: SELECT DISTINCT '' AS EQPTID , E.EQUIPMENT_GROUP_ID AS EQGRID , '' AS Code , '' AS Sto_Desc FROM TB_EGN_EQUIP_SPEC_MST E INNER JOIN TB_EGN_FCTRY_AREA_MST TEFAM ON E.REPRESENTATIVE_FACTORY_CODE = TEFAM.REPRESENTATIVE_FACTORY_CODE AND E.FACTORY_AREA_ID = TEFAM.FACTORY_AREA_ID WHERE TEFAM.FACILITY_CODE = @AREA_ID AND TEFAM.MES_SYSTEM_TYPE_CODE = @SYSTEM_TYPE_CODE AND E.EQUIPMENT_GROUP_ID NOT IN ('MCS') UNION SELECT DISTINCT '' AS EQPTID , E.EQUIPMENT_GROUP_ID AS EQGRID , '' AS Code , '' AS Sto_Desc FROM TB_EGN_EQUIP_SPEC_MST E INNER JOIN TB_EGN_FCTRY_AREA_MST TEFAM ON E.REPRESENTATIVE_FACTORY_CODE = TEFAM.REPRESENTATIVE_FACTORY_CODE AND E.FACTORY_AREA_ID = TEFAM.FACTORY_AREA_ID WHERE TEFAM.FACILITY_CODE = @AREA_ID -- option1 AND E.EQUIPMENT_GROUP_ID = 'PKG'
